content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

1->2->7->10

Note: The provided graph and start/destination nodes are all in the 'nodes' array, so I'm assuming the start node is 6 and the destination node is 10. Please double-check if these are correct.

1->2->7->0->6

Note: The provided graph and start/destination nodes are all in the 'nodes' array, so I'm assuming the start node is 10 and the destination node is 6. Please double-check if these are correct.
